sentences.zh: 秦之先，帝顓頊之苗裔孫曰女修。
女修織，玄鳥隕卵，女修吞之，生子大業。
大業取少典之子，曰女華。
女華生大費，與禹平水土。
已成，帝錫玄圭。
禹受曰：「非予能成，亦大費為輔。」
帝舜曰：「咨爾費，贊禹功，其賜爾皁游。
爾後嗣將大出。」
乃妻之姚姓之玉女。
大費拜受，佐舜調馴鳥獸，鳥獸多馴服，是為柏翳。
舜賜姓嬴氏。

translations.literal: The ancestors of Qin were descendants of Emperor Zhuanxu, a remote grandson named Nüxiu. Nüxiu was weaving when a dark bird dropped an egg; Nüxiu swallowed it and gave birth to a son named Daye. Daye married the daughter of Shaodian, named Nühua. Nühua gave birth to Da Fei, who helped Yu control the floods. When this was accomplished, the emperor bestowed a black jade tablet. Yu accepted it saying: 'It was not my ability alone that accomplished this; Da Fei was my assistant.' Emperor Shun said: 'Ah, Fei, you aided Yu's achievements. I grant you a black banner. Your descendants will greatly multiply.' He married him to a jade maiden of the Yao clan. Da Fei bowed and accepted, assisted Shun in taming birds and beasts, and many birds and beasts became tame. This was Bai Yi. Shun granted the surname Ying.

sentences.zh: 大費生子二人：一曰大廉，實鳥俗氏；
二曰若木，實費氏。
其玄孫曰費昌，子孫或在中國，或在夷狄。
費昌當夏桀之時，去夏歸商，為湯御，以敗桀於鳴條。
大廉玄孫曰孟戲、中衍，鳥身人言。
帝太戊聞而卜之使御，吉，遂致使御而妻之。
自太戊以下，中衍之後，遂世有功，以佐殷國，故嬴姓多顯，遂為諸侯。

translations.literal: Bai Yi's descendants became numerous. The second was Ruo Mu, who was the ancestor of the Fei clan. His great-grandson was Fei Chang, whose descendants were sometimes in the Central States, sometimes among the barbarians. Fei Chang, during the time of Xia Jie, left Xia and went to Shang, drove for Tang, and defeated Jie at Mingtiao. Da Lian's great-grandsons were Meng Xi and Zhong Yan, who had bird bodies and human speech. Emperor Tai Wu heard of it and divined to have them drive his chariot; it was auspicious, so he had them drive and married them wives. From Tai Wu downward, Zhong Yan's descendants generation after generation had merit, assisting the Yin state, therefore the Ying surname became prominent, and became feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 其玄孫曰中潏，在西戎，保西垂。
生蜚廉。
蜚廉生惡來。
惡來有力，蜚廉善走，父子俱以材力事殷紂。
周武王之伐紂，并殺惡來。
是時蜚廉為紂石北方，還，無所報，為壇霍太山而報，得石棺，銘曰「帝令處父不與殷亂，賜爾石棺以華氏」。
死，遂葬於霍太山。
蜚廉復有子曰季勝。
季勝生孟增。
孟增幸於周成王，是為宅皋狼。
皋狼生衡父，衡父生造父。
造父以善御幸於周繆王，得驥、溫驪、驊騮、騄耳之駟，西巡狩，樂而忘歸。
徐偃王作亂，造父為繆王御，長驅歸周，一日千里以救亂。
繆王以趙城封造父，造父族由此為趙氏。
自蜚廉生季勝已下五世至造父，別居趙。
趙衰其後也。
惡來革者，蜚廉子也，蚤死。
有子曰女防。
女防生旁皋，旁皋生太幾，太幾生大駱，大駱生非子。
以造父之寵，皆蒙趙城，姓趙氏。

translations.literal: His great-grandson was Zhong Hao, in the Western Rong, guarded the western frontier. He gave birth to Fei Lian. Fei Lian gave birth to E Lai. E Lai was strong, Fei Lian was good at running, father and son both served King Zhou of Yin with their strength and abilities. When King Wu of Zhou attacked Zhou, he also killed E Lai. At this time Fei Lian was building stone walls in the north for Zhou, returned, had nothing to report, built an altar at Huo Mountain to make a report, obtained a stone coffin, inscribed: 'The Emperor commands Chu Fu not to participate in Yin's disorder, grants you this stone coffin to make your clan flourish.' When he died, he was buried at Huo Mountain. Fei Lian again had a son named Ji Sheng. Ji Sheng gave birth to Meng Zeng. Meng Zeng was favored by King Cheng of Zhou, this was Zhai Gao Lang. Gao Lang gave birth to Heng Fu, Heng Fu gave birth to Zao Fu. Zao Fu, because he was skilled at driving chariots, was favored by King Mu of Zhou, obtained the team of Ji, Wen Li, Hua Liu, and Luo Er, went on western tour of inspection, enjoyed it and forgot to return. When King Xu Jian rebelled, Zao Fu drove for King Mu, drove long distance back to Zhou, one day a thousand li to save the disorder. King Mu enfeoffed Zao Fu with Zhao city, Zao Fu's clan thereby became the Zhao clan. From Fei Lian giving birth to Ji Sheng downward, five generations to Zao Fu, separately resided in Zhao. Zhao Shuai was his descendant. E Lai Ge was Fei Lian's son, died young. Had a son named Nü Fang. Nü Fang gave birth to Pang Gao, Pang Gao gave birth to Tai Ji, Tai Ji gave birth to Da Luo, Da Luo gave birth to Fei Zi. Because of Zao Fu's favor, all received enfeoffment of Zhao city, surnamed Zhao clan.

sentences.zh: 非子居犬丘，好馬及畜，善養息之。
犬丘人言之周孝王，孝王召使主馬于汧渭之閒，馬大蕃息。
孝王欲以為大駱適嗣。
申侯之女為大駱妻，生子成為適。
申侯乃言孝王曰：「昔我先酈山之女，為戎胥軒妻，生中潏，以親故歸周，保西垂，西垂以其故和睦。
今我復與大駱妻，生適子成。
申駱重婚，西戎皆服，所以為王。
王其圖之。」
於是孝王曰：「昔伯翳為舜主畜，畜多息，故有土，賜姓嬴。
今其後世亦為朕息馬，朕其分土為附庸。」
邑之秦，使復續嬴氏祀，號曰秦嬴。
亦不廢申侯之女子為駱適者，以和西戎。

translations.literal: Fei Zi resided in Quan Qiu, loved horses and livestock, was skilled at raising and breeding them. Quan Qiu people spoke of it to King Xiao of Zhou, King Xiao summoned him to manage horses between Qian and Wei, horses greatly multiplied. King Xiao wished to make him the legitimate heir of Daliang. The daughter of Shen Hou became Daliang's wife, and gave birth to a son named Cheng as the legitimate heir. Shen Hou then spoke to King Xiao saying: 'In ancient times, my ancestor from Li Mountain became the wife of Xuxuan the Rong, and gave birth to Zhongyan. Because of kinship ties, she returned to Zhou and protected the western border. The western border was harmonious because of this. Now I again married my daughter to Daliang, giving birth to the legitimate son Cheng. Shen and Liang have intermarried twice; the western Rong all submit. This is for the sake of the king.' Please consider this.' Therefore King Xiao said: 'In ancient times, Bai Yi raised livestock for Shun; the livestock greatly multiplied, therefore he received land and was granted the surname Ying. Now his descendants also breed horses for me; I will divide land as a fief.' He enfeoffed them at Qin, to continue the Ying clan sacrifices, titled Qin Ying. He also did not reject Shen Hou's daughter as Daliang's legitimate wife, to pacify the western Rong.

sentences.zh: 秦嬴生秦侯。
秦侯立十年，卒。
生公伯。
公伯立三年，卒。
生秦仲。

translations.literal: Cheng's son was Duke Zhuang of Qin. Duke Zhuang's son was Duke Xiang of Qin. Gave birth to Gong Bo. Gong Bo ruled for three years, died. Gave birth to Qin Zhong.

sentences.zh: 秦仲立三年，周厲王無道，諸侯或叛之。
西戎反王室，滅犬丘大駱之族。
周宣王即位，乃以秦仲為大夫，誅西戎。
西戎殺秦仲。
秦仲立二十三年，死於戎。
有子五人，其長者曰莊公。
周宣王乃召莊公昆弟五人，與兵七千人，使伐西戎，破之。
於是復予秦仲後，及其先大駱地犬丘并有之，為西垂大夫。

translations.literal: Qin Zhong ruled for three years. King Li of Zhou was tyrannical, some feudal lords rebelled against him. The Western Rong rebelled against the royal house, extinguished the Quan Qiu and Da Liang clans. When King Xuan of Zhou ascended, he made Qin Zhong a minister, to punish the Western Rong. The Western Rong killed Qin Zhong. Qin Zhong ruled for twenty-three years, died among the Rong. Had five sons, the eldest was Duke Zhuang. King Xuan of Zhou then summoned Duke Zhuang and his four brothers, gave them seven thousand troops, sent them to attack the Western Rong, defeated them. Thus he restored to Qin Zhong's descendants, and gave them their former Da Liang territory Quan Qiu to possess together, made him Minister of the Western Frontier.

sentences.zh: 莊公居其故西犬丘，生子三人，其長男世父。
世父曰：「戎殺我大父仲，我非殺戎王則不敢入邑。」
遂將擊戎，讓其弟襄公。
襄公為太子。
莊公立四十四年，卒，太子襄公代立。
襄公元年，以女弟繆嬴為豐王妻。
襄公二年，戎圍犬丘，（世父）世父擊之，為戎人所虜。
歲餘，復歸世父。
七年春，周幽王用褒姒廢太子，立褒姒子為適，數欺諸侯，諸侯叛之。
西戎犬戎與申侯伐周，殺幽王酈山下。
而秦襄公將兵救周，戰甚力，有功。
周避犬戎難，東徙雒邑，襄公以兵送周平王。
平王封襄公為諸侯，賜之岐以西之地。
曰：「戎無道，侵奪我岐、豐之地，秦能攻逐戎，即有其地。」
與誓，封爵之。
襄公於是始國，與諸侯通使聘享之禮，乃用騮駒、黃牛、羝羊各三，祠上帝西畤。
十二年，伐戎而至岐，卒。
生文公。

translations.literal: Duke Zhuang resided in his former western Quan Qiu, gave birth to three sons, the eldest son Shi Fu. Shi Fu said: 'The Rong killed my grandfather Zhong, I will not dare enter the city unless I kill the Rong king.' Then he led troops to attack the Rong, yielded to his younger brother Duke Xiang. Duke Xiang became crown prince. Duke Zhuang ruled for forty-four years, died, Crown Prince Duke Xiang succeeded him. Duke Xiang's first year, married his younger sister Mu Ying as wife to the Feng king. Duke Xiang's second year, the Rong besieged Quan Qiu, Shi Fu attacked them, was captured by the Rong people. After more than a year, Shi Fu returned. Seventh year spring, King You of Zhou, influenced by Bao Si, deposed the crown prince, established Bao Si's son as legitimate heir, repeatedly deceived the feudal lords, the feudal lords rebelled against him. The Western Rong Quanrong together with Shen Hou attacked Zhou, killed King You at the foot of Li Mountain. Duke Xiang of Qin led troops to rescue Zhou, fought very hard, had merit. Zhou, to avoid the Quanrong disaster, moved east to Luoyi, Duke Xiang escorted King Ping of Zhou with troops. King Ping enfeoffed Duke Xiang as a feudal lord, granted him the land west of Qi. Saying: 'The Rong are unrighteous, have invaded and seized my Qi and Feng lands. If Qin can attack and drive out the Rong, then possess their land.' Made covenant with him, enfeoffed and granted him rank. Duke Xiang thus began to establish his state, communicated with the feudal lords using the rituals of envoys and tribute feasts, then used three sorrel horses, three yellow cattle, three rams each, to sacrifice to the Supreme Deity at the Western Altar. Twelfth year, attacked the Rong and reached Qi, died. He gave birth to Duke Wen.

sentences.zh: 文公元年，居西垂宮。
三年，文公以兵七百人東獵。
四年，至汧渭之會。
曰：「昔周邑我先秦嬴於此，後卒獲為諸侯。」
乃卜居之，占曰吉，即營邑之。
十年，初為鄜畤，用三牢。
十三年，初有史以紀事，民多化者。
十六年，文公以兵伐戎，戎敗走。
於是文公遂收周餘民有之，地至岐，岐以東獻之周。
十九年，得陳寶。
二十年，法初有三族之罪。
二十七年，伐南山大梓，豐大特。
四十八年，文公太子卒，賜謚為竫公。
竫公之長子為太子，是文公孫也。
五十年，文公卒，葬西山。
竫公子立，是為寧公。

translations.literal: Duke Wen of Qin first year, resided at Xichui Palace. Third year, Duke Wen led 700 troops to hunt eastward. Fourth year, arrived at the confluence of Qian and Wei. He said: 'In ancient times, Zhou enfeoffed our ancestor Qin Ying here; later he finally became a lord.' He divined for residence; the omen said auspicious, so he built a city there. Tenth year, first established the Fu altar, using three sacrificial animals. Thirteenth year, first had historians to record events; many people became civilized. Sixteenth year, Duke Wen led troops to attack the Rong; the Rong were defeated and fled. Therefore Duke Wen gathered the remaining Zhou people and possessed them; territory reached Qi, east of Qi he presented to Zhou. Nineteenth year, obtained the Chen treasure. Twentieth year, laws first had the crime of three clans. Twenty-seventh year, attacked the great catalpa trees of South Mountain, Feng great boar. Forty-eighth year, Duke Wen's crown prince died, granted posthumous title Duke Zhuang. Duke Zhuang's eldest son became crown prince, this was Duke Wen's grandson. Fiftieth year, Duke Wen died, buried at West Mountain. Duke Zhuang's son ascended, this was Duke Ning.

sentences.zh: 寧公二年，公徙居平陽。
遣兵伐蕩社。
三年，與亳戰，亳王奔戎，遂滅蕩社。
四年，魯公子翬弒其君隱公。
十二年，伐蕩氏，取之。
寧公生十歲立，立十二年卒，葬西山。
生子三人，長男武公為太子。
武公弟德公，同母魯姬子。
生出子。
寧公卒，大庶長弗忌、威壘、三父廢太子而立出子為君。
出子六年，三父等復共令人賊殺出子。
出子生五歲立，立六年卒。
三父等乃復立故太子武公。

translations.literal: Duke Ning second year, the duke moved to reside at Pingyang. Sent troops to attack Tangshe. Third year, fought with Hao, Hao king fled to Rong, then extinguished Dangshe. Fourth year, Lu nobleman Hui assassinated his lord Duke Yin. Twelfth year, attacked Dang clan, took it. Duke Ning was ten years old when he ascended, ruled twelve years, died, buried at West Mountain. Gave birth to three sons, eldest son Duke Wu became crown prince. Duke Wu's younger brother Duke De, same mother Lu Ji's son. Gave birth to Chu Zi. Duke Ning died, Grand Commandant Fu Ji, Wei Lei, San Fu deposed the crown prince and established Chu Zi as lord. Chu Zi sixth year, San Fu and others again together had someone assassinate Chu Zi. Chu Zi was five years old when he ascended, ruled six years, died. San Fu and others then again established the former crown prince Duke Wu.

sentences.zh: 武公元年，伐彭戲氏，至于華山下，居平陽封宮。
三年，誅三父等而夷三族，以其殺出子也。
鄭高渠瞇殺其君昭公。
十年，伐邽、冀戎，初縣之。
十一年，初縣杜、鄭。
滅小虢。

translations.literal: Duke Wu first year, attacked Pengxi clan, reached under Hua Mountain, resided at Pingyang Feng Palace. Third year, executed San Fu and others and exterminated their three clans, because they killed Chu Zi. Zheng noble Gao Qu Mi assassinated his lord Duke Zhao. Tenth year, attacked Gui and Ji Rong, first established counties there. Eleventh year, first established counties at Du and Zheng. Extinguished Xiao Guo.

sentences.zh: 十三年，齊人管至父、連稱等殺其君襄公而立公孫無知。
晉滅霍、魏、耿。
齊雍廩殺無知、管至父等而立齊桓公。
齊、晉為彊國。

translations.literal: Thirteenth year, Qi people Guan Zhifu, Lian Cheng and others assassinated their lord Duke Xiang and established Gongsun Wuzhi. Jin extinguished Huo, Wei, Geng. Qi Yong Lin assassinated Wuzhi, Guan Zhifu and others and established Duke Huan of Qi. Qi and Jin became strong states.

sentences.zh: 十九年，晉曲沃始為晉侯。
齊桓公伯於鄄。

translations.literal: Nineteenth year, Jin Quwo first became Jin Hou. Duke Huan of Qi became hegemon at Juan.

sentences.zh: 二十年，武公卒，葬雍平陽。
初以人從死，從死者六十六人。
有子一人，名曰白，白不立，封平陽。
立其弟德公。

translations.literal: Twentieth year, Duke Wu died, buried at Yong Pingyang. First time using humans to follow in death; those who followed in death were sixty-six people. He had one son, named Bai; Bai was not established, enfeoffed at Pingyang. Established his younger brother Duke De.

sentences.zh: 德公元年，初居雍城大鄭宮。
以犧三百牢祠鄜畤。
卜居雍。
後子孫飲馬於河。
梁伯、芮伯來朝。
二年，初伏，以狗御蠱。
德公生三十三歲而立，立二年卒。
生子三人：長子宣公，中子成公，少子穆公。
長子宣公立。

translations.literal: Duke De first year, first resided in Yong city's Grand Zheng Palace. Used 300 sacrificial animals to worship at the Fu altar. Divined for residence at Yong. Later descendants watered horses at the Yellow River. Duke Liang of Liang and Duke Rui of Rui came to court. Second year, first performed the fu sacrifice, used dogs to ward off gu poison. Duke De was thirty-three years old when he ascended, ruled two years, died. Gave birth to three sons: eldest son Duke Xuan, middle son Duke Cheng, youngest son Duke Mu. Eldest son Duke Xuan ascended.

sentences.zh: 宣公元年，衛、燕伐周，出惠王，立王子穨。
三年，鄭伯、虢叔殺子穨而入惠王。
四年，作密畤。
與晉戰河陽，勝之。
十二年，宣公卒。
生子九人，莫立，立其弟成公。

translations.literal: Duke Xuan first year, Wei and Yan attacked Zhou, expelled King Hui, established Prince Dai. Third year, Duke Zheng of Zheng and Uncle Guo killed Prince Dai and reinstated King Hui. Fourth year, established the Mi altar. Fought with Jin at Heyang, defeated them. Twelfth year, Duke Xuan died. Had nine sons, none established, established his younger brother Duke Cheng.

sentences.zh: 成公元年，梁伯、芮伯來朝。
齊桓公伐山戎，次于孤竹。

translations.literal: Duke Cheng first year, Duke Liang of Liang and Duke Rui of Rui came to court. Duke Huan of Qi attacked the Shanrong, camped at Guzhu.

sentences.zh: 成公立四年卒。
子七人，莫立，立其弟繆公。

translations.literal: Duke Cheng ruled four years, died. Had seven sons, none established, established his younger brother Duke Mu.

sentences.zh: 繆公任好元年，自將伐茅津，勝之。
四年，迎婦於晉，晉太子申生姊也。
其歲，齊桓公伐楚，至邵陵。

translations.literal: Duke Mu Renhao first year, personally led troops to attack Maoxin, defeated them. Fourth year, welcomed a wife from Jin, she was Crown Prince Shen Sheng's sister. That year, Duke Huan of Qi attacked Chu, reached Shaoling.

sentences.zh: 五年，晉獻公滅虞、虢，虜虞君與其大夫百里傒，以璧馬賂於虞故也。
既虜百里傒，以為秦繆公夫人媵於秦。
百里傒亡秦走宛，楚鄙人執之。
繆公聞百里傒賢，欲重贖之，恐楚人不與，乃使人謂楚曰：「吾媵臣百里傒在焉，請以五羖羊皮贖之。」
楚人遂許與之。
當是時，百里傒年已七十餘。
繆公釋其囚，與語國事。
謝曰：「臣亡國之臣，何足問！」
繆公曰：「虞君不用子，故亡，非子罪也。」
固問，語三日，繆公大說，授之國政，號曰五羖大夫。
百里傒讓曰：「臣不及臣友蹇叔，蹇叔賢而世莫知。
臣常游困於齊而乞食铚人，蹇叔收臣。
臣因而欲事齊君無知，蹇叔止臣，臣得脫齊難，遂之周。
周王子穨好牛，臣以養牛干之。
及穨欲用臣，蹇叔止臣，臣去，得不誅。
事虞君，蹇叔止臣。
臣知虞君不用臣，臣誠私利祿爵，且留。
再用其言，得脫，一不用，及虞君難：是以知其賢。」
於是繆公使人厚幣迎蹇叔，以為上大夫。

translations.literal: Fifth year, Duke Xian of Jin extinguished Yu and Guo, captured the Yu lord and his minister Baili Xi; because of the jade and horses bribed to Yu previously. Having captured Baili Xi, gave him as concubine to Duke Mu of Qin's wife. Baili Xi escaped from Qin, fled to Wan, Chu border people captured him. Duke Mu heard Baili Xi was worthy, wanted to ransom him with a high price, feared Chu would not give him, so sent someone to tell Chu: 'My concubine's servant Baili Xi is there, please ransom him with five black ram skins.' . Chu people then agreed to give him. At this time, Baili Xi was already over seventy years old. Duke Mu released him from prison, discussed state affairs with him. Declined saying: 'I am a minister of a ruined state, why ask me!' Duke Mu said: 'The Yu lord did not employ you, therefore perished; it was not your crime.' Insisted on asking, talked for three days, Duke Mu was greatly pleased, entrusted him with state administration, titled him Minister of Five Black Rams. Baili Xi declined saying: 'I am not as good as my friend Jian Shu. Jian Shu is worthy but the world does not know it. I once wandered destitute in Qi and begged for food from people of Zhi; Jian Shu took me in. I therefore wanted to serve Qi lord Wuzhi; Jian Shu stopped me, I escaped the Qi disaster, then went to Zhou. Zhou prince Dai loved cattle; I approached him by raising cattle. When Dai wanted to employ me, Jian Shu stopped me; I left, avoided execution. Serving the Yu lord, Jian Shu stopped me. I knew the Yu lord would not employ me; I truly sought personal profit in rank and salary, so stayed. Twice I followed his advice and escaped; once I did not follow, and encountered the Yu lord's disaster: this is how I know his worthiness.' Therefore Duke Mu sent people with generous gifts to welcome Jian Shu, made him Senior Minister.

sentences.zh: 秋，繆公自將伐晉，戰於河曲。
晉驪姬作亂，太子申生死新城，重耳、夷吾出奔。

translations.literal: Autumn, Duke Mu personally led troops to attack Jin, fought at Hequ. Jin Li Ji caused rebellion, Crown Prince Shen Sheng died in Xincheng, Chong'er and Yiwu fled.

sentences.zh: 九年，齊桓公會諸侯於葵丘。

translations.literal: Ninth year, Duke Huan of Qi assembled the feudal lords at Kuiqiu.

sentences.zh: 晉獻公卒。
立驪姬子奚齊，其臣里克殺奚齊。
荀息立卓子，克又殺卓子及荀息。
夷吾使人請秦，求入晉。
於是繆公許之，使百里傒將兵送夷吾。
夷吾謂曰：「誠得立，請割晉之河西八城與秦。」
及至，已立，而使丕鄭謝秦，背約不與河西城，而殺裏克。
丕鄭聞之，恐，因與繆公謀曰：「晉人不欲夷吾，實欲重耳。
今背秦約而殺裏克，皆呂甥、郤芮之計也。
願君以利急召呂、郤，呂、郤至，則更入重耳便。」
繆公許之，使人與丕鄭歸，召呂、郤。
呂、郤等疑丕鄭有閒，乃言夷吾殺丕鄭。
丕鄭子丕豹奔秦，說繆公曰：「晉君無道，百姓不親，可伐也。」
繆公曰：「百姓茍不便，何故能誅其大臣？
能誅其大臣，此其調也。」
不聽，而陰用豹。

translations.literal: Duke Xian of Jin died. Established Li Ji's son Xi Qi; his minister Li Ke killed Xi Qi. Xun Xi established Zhuo Zi; Ke again killed Zhuo Zi and Xun Xi. Yiwu sent people to request Qin, seeking to enter Jin. Therefore Duke Mu agreed, sent Baili Xi to lead troops escorting Yiwu. Yiwu said to him: 'If I truly succeed, I will cede Jin's eight cities west of the river to Qin.' When they arrived, he was already established, but sent Pi Zheng to thank Qin, reneged on the agreement and did not give the cities west of the river, and killed Li Ke. Pi Zheng heard of this, feared, therefore plotted with Duke Mu saying: 'The Jin people do not want Yi Wu, they truly want Chong'er. Now reneging on the Qin agreement and killing Li Ke, all are Lü Sheng and Xi Rui's plans.' I wish you would urgently summon Lü and Xi with benefits; when Lü and Xi arrive, then change and enter Chong'er instead.' Duke Mu agreed, sent someone with Pi Zheng to return, summoned Lü and Xi. Lü, Xi and others suspected Pi Zheng had secrets, so said Yi Wu killed Pi Zheng. Pi Zheng's son Pi Bao fled to Qin, persuaded Duke Mu saying: 'The Jin ruler is without the Way, the common people are not close to him, he can be attacked.' Duke Mu said: 'If the common people were truly not close, how could they execute their ministers? Being able to execute their ministers shows they are in harmony.' He did not listen, but secretly employed Bao.

sentences.zh: 十二年，齊管仲、隰朋死。

translations.literal: Twelfth year, Qi's Guan Zhong and Xi Peng died.

sentences.zh: 晉旱，來請粟。
丕豹說繆公勿與，因其饑而伐之。
繆公問公孫支，支曰：「饑穰更事耳，不可不與。」
問百里傒，傒曰：「夷吾得罪於君，其百姓何罪？」
於是用百里傒、公孫支言，卒與之粟。
以船漕車轉，自雍相望至絳。

translations.literal: Jin suffered drought, came to request grain. Pi Bao persuaded Duke Mu not to give it, to take advantage of their hunger and attack them. Duke Mu asked Gong Sun Zhi, Zhi said: 'Famine and abundance alternate, we cannot not give.' Asked Baili Xi, Xi said: 'Yi Wu offended his lord, but what crime have his common people committed?' Therefore followed Baili Xi and Gong Sun Zhi's advice, in the end gave grain to them. Used boats to transport and carts to transfer, from Yong they could see each other all the way to Jiang.

sentences.zh: 十四年，秦饑，請粟於晉。
晉君謀之群臣。
虢射曰：「因其饑伐之，可有大功。」
晉君從之。
十五年，興兵將攻秦。
繆公發兵，使丕豹將，自往擊之。
九月壬戌，與晉惠公夷吾合戰於韓地。
晉君棄其軍，與秦爭利，還而馬騺。
繆公與麾下馳追之，不能得晉君，反為晉軍所圍。
晉擊繆公，繆公傷。
於是岐下食善馬者三百人馳冒晉軍，晉軍解圍，遂脫繆公而反生得晉君。
初，繆公亡善馬，岐下野人共得而食之者三百餘人，吏逐得，欲法之。
繆公曰：「君子不以畜產害人。
吾聞食善馬肉不飲酒，傷人。」
乃皆賜酒而赦之。
三百人者聞秦擊晉，皆求從，從而見繆公窘，亦皆推鋒爭死，以報食馬之德。
於是繆公虜晉君以歸，令於國，齊宿，吾將以晉君祠上帝。
周天子聞之，曰「晉我同姓」，為請晉君。
夷吾姊亦為繆公夫人，夫人聞之，乃衰绖跣，曰：「妾兄弟不能相救，以辱君命。」
繆公曰：「我得晉君以為功，今天子為請，夫人是憂。」
乃與晉君盟，許歸之，更舍上舍，而饋之七牢。
十一月，歸晉君夷吾，夷吾獻其河西地，使太子圉為質於秦。
秦妻子圉以宗女。
是時秦地東至河。

translations.literal: Fourteenth year, Qin suffered famine, requested grain from Jin. The Jin ruler consulted his ministers. Guo She said: 'Take advantage of their famine to attack them, we can achieve great merit.' The Jin ruler followed this. Fifteenth year, raised troops to attack Qin. Duke Mu sent troops, made Pi Bao general, personally went to attack them. In ninth month, Renchen day, fought a combined battle with Jin Hui Duke Yi Wu at Han territory. The Jin ruler abandoned his army, competed with Qin for advantage, retreated and his horse stumbled. Duke Mu with his subordinates galloped after him, could not catch the Jin ruler, instead was surrounded by Jin army. Jin attacked Duke Mu, Duke Mu was injured. Therefore the 300 men from under Qi Mountain who ate the fine horses charged through the Jin army, Jin army lifted the siege, thus rescued Duke Mu and instead captured the Jin ruler alive. Initially, Duke Mu lost fine horses, wild men under Qi Mountain together got and ate them, over 300 people; officials pursued and caught them, wanted to punish them by law. Duke Mu said: 'A gentleman does not harm people because of livestock. I have heard that eating fine horse meat without drinking wine harms people.' Then granted them all wine and pardoned them. Those 300 men heard Qin was attacking Jin, all requested to follow; following and seeing Duke Mu in distress, they all pushed forward their spears and fought to the death, to repay the grace of eating the horses. Therefore Duke Mu captured the Jin ruler and returned, ordered in the state: Fast and stay overnight, I will sacrifice the Jin ruler to the Supreme Deity. The Zhou Son of Heaven heard of it, said 'Jin is my same surname clan,' interceded for the Jin ruler. Yi Wu's sister was also Duke Mu's wife; the wife heard of it, wore mourning clothes barefoot, said: 'My brothers cannot rescue each other, bringing disgrace to your majesty's command.' Duke Mu said: 'I captured the Jin ruler as merit, now the Son of Heaven intercedes for him, this makes the wife worried.' Then made covenant with the Jin ruler, agreed to return him, changed to upper quarters, and fed him seven sacrificial animals. Eleventh month, returned Jin ruler Yi Wu; Yi Wu offered his territory west of the river, sent Crown Prince Yu as hostage in Qin. Qin married Yu to a daughter of the royal clan. At this time Qin territory reached east to the Yellow River.

sentences.zh: 十八年，齊桓公卒。
二十年，秦滅梁、芮。

translations.literal: Eighteenth year, Duke Huan of Qi died. Twentieth year, Qin destroyed Liang and Rui.

sentences.zh: 二十二年，晉公子圉聞晉君病，曰：「梁，我母家也，而秦滅之。
我兄弟多，即君百歲後，秦必留我，而晉輕，亦更立他子。」
子圉乃亡歸晉。
二十三年，晉惠公卒，子圉立為君。
秦怨圉亡去，乃迎晉公子重耳於楚，而妻以故子圉妻。
重耳初謝，後乃受。
繆公益禮厚遇之。
二十四年春，秦使人告晉大臣，欲入重耳。
晉許之，於是使人送重耳。
二月，重耳立為晉君，是為文公。
文公使人殺子圉。
子圉是為懷公。

translations.literal: Twenty-second year, Jin noble Yu heard the Jin ruler was ill, said: 'Liang is my mother's family, and Qin destroyed it. I have many brothers; after the ruler reaches one hundred years, Qin will certainly keep me, and Jin is weak, will also establish another son.' Yu then fled back to Jin. Twenty-third year, Duke Hui of Jin died, Yu ascended as ruler. Qin resented Yu's flight, then welcomed Jin noble Chong'er from Chu, and married him to Yu's former wife. Chong'er initially declined, later then accepted. Duke Mu increased his courtesy and treated him generously. Twenty-fourth year spring, Qin sent people to inform Jin ministers, wanting to install Chong'er. Jin agreed, then sent people to escort Chong'er. Second month, Chong'er ascended as Jin ruler, this was Duke Wen. Duke Wen sent people to kill Yu. Yu was Duke Huai.

sentences.zh: 其秋，周襄王弟帶以翟伐王，王出居鄭。
二十五年，周王使人告難於晉、秦。
秦繆公將兵助晉文公入襄王，殺王弟帶。
二十八年，晉文公敗楚於城濮。
三十年，繆公助晉文公圍鄭。
鄭使人言繆公曰：「亡鄭厚晉，於晉而得矣，而秦未有利。
晉之彊，秦之憂也。」
繆公乃罷兵歸。
晉亦罷。
三十二年冬，晉文公卒。

translations.literal: That autumn, King Xiang of Zhou's younger brother Dai with the Di attacked the king, the king went out and resided in Zheng. Twenty-fifth year, the Zhou king sent people to report distress to Jin and Qin. Duke Mu of Qin led troops to help Duke Wen of Jin restore King Xiang, killed the king's younger brother Dai. Twenty-eighth year, Duke Wen of Jin defeated Chu at Chengpu. Thirtieth year, Duke Mu helped Duke Wen of Jin besiege Zheng. Zheng sent people to speak to Duke Mu: 'Destroying Zheng would benefit Jin, and Jin would get it, but Qin has not yet had benefit. Jin's strength is Qin's worry.' Duke Mu then stopped the troops and returned. Jin also stopped. Thirty-second year winter, Duke Wen of Jin died.

sentences.zh: 鄭人有賣鄭於秦曰：「我主其城門，鄭可襲也。」
繆公問蹇叔、百里傒，對曰：「徑數國千里而襲人，希有得利者。
且人賣鄭，庸知我國人不有以我情告鄭者乎？
不可。」
繆公曰：「子不知也，吾已決矣。」
遂發兵，使百里傒子孟明視，蹇叔子西乞術及白乙丙將兵。
行日，百里傒、蹇叔二人哭之。
繆公聞，怒曰：「孤發兵而子沮哭吾軍，何也？」
二老曰：「臣非敢沮君軍。
軍行，臣子與往；
臣老，遲還恐不相見，故哭耳。」
二老退，謂其子曰：「汝軍即敗，必於殽阨矣。」
三十三年春，秦兵遂東，更晉地，過周北門。
周王孫滿曰：「秦師無禮，不敗何待！」
兵至滑，鄭販賣賈人弦高，持十二牛將賣之周，見秦兵，恐死虜，因獻其牛，曰：「聞大國將誅鄭，鄭君謹修守御備，使臣以牛十二勞軍士。」
秦三將軍相謂曰：「將襲鄭，鄭今已覺之，往無及已。」
滅滑。
滑，晉之邊邑也。

translations.literal: A man from Zheng sold Zheng to Qin saying: 'I control the city gates, Zheng can be attacked by surprise.' Duke Mu asked Jian Shu and Bai Li Xi, they replied: 'Going through several states a thousand li to attack by surprise, rarely succeeds. Moreover, this man sells Zheng, how do we know our own people haven't told Zheng our plans?' Cannot be done.' Duke Mu said: 'You do not understand, I have already decided.' He sent troops, had Bai Li Xi's son Meng Ming Shi, Jian Shu's son Xi Qi Shu, and Bai Yi Bing lead the troops. On the day of departure, Bai Li Xi and Jian Shu wept for them. Duke Mu heard and was angry, saying: 'I send troops and you cry to obstruct my army, why?' The two elders said: 'We do not dare obstruct your army. The army goes out and we cannot return, this is why we weep.' We are old, if we return late we fear we won't see each other again, that is why we weep.' The two elders withdrew and told their sons: 'Your army will certainly be defeated, at the Xiao defile.' Thirty-third year spring, Qin troops went east, passed through Jin territory, went by Zhou's north gate. Zhou King Sun Man said: 'Qin army is discourteous, if not defeated, what are they waiting for!' The troops reached Hua, Zheng merchant Xian Gao, holding twelve oxen to sell in Zhou, saw Qin troops, feared being killed or captured, so offered his oxen, saying: 'I heard the great state will punish Zheng, the Zheng ruler carefully prepares defenses, sent me with twelve oxen to reward the soldiers.' The three Qin generals said to each other: 'We were going to attack Zheng by surprise, but Zheng now knows about it, going there is useless.' Destroyed Hua. Hua was Jin's border town.

sentences.zh: 當是時，晉文公喪尚未葬。
太子襄公怒曰：「秦侮我孤，因喪破我滑。」
遂墨衰绖，發兵遮秦兵於殽，擊之，大破秦軍，無一人得脫者。
虜秦三將以歸。
文公夫人，秦女也，為秦三囚將請曰：「繆公之怨此三人入於骨髓，願令此三人歸，令我君得自快烹之。」
晉君許之，歸秦三將。
三將至，繆公素服郊迎，向三人哭曰：「孤以不用百里傒、蹇叔言以辱三子，三子何罪乎？
子其悉心雪恥，毋怠。」
遂復三人官秩如故，愈益厚之。

translations.literal: At this time, Duke Wen of Jin's funeral had not yet taken place. Crown Prince Xiang Gong was angry, saying: 'Qin insults my orphan status, takes advantage of mourning to destroy our Hua.' Then wore black mourning clothes, sent troops to block Qin army at Xiao, attacked them, greatly defeated Qin army, not one person escaped. Captured the three Qin generals and returned. Duke Wen's wife, a Qin woman, interceded for the three captive Qin generals, saying: 'Duke Mu's resentment toward these three men has entered his bone marrow; I wish to have these three men returned so my lord can personally enjoy cooking them.' The Jin ruler agreed, returned the three Qin generals. When the three generals arrived, Duke Mu wore plain clothes and welcomed them in the suburbs, facing the three men and weeping, said: 'I brought disgrace on you three by not listening to Bai Li Xi and Jian Shu's words; what crime did you three commit? You must wholeheartedly avenge this shame, do not slacken.' Then restored the three men's official ranks as before, and treated them even more generously.

sentences.zh: 三十四年，楚太子商臣弒其父成王代立。

translations.literal: Thirty-fourth year, Chu Crown Prince Shang Chen assassinated his father King Cheng and replaced him.

sentences.zh: 繆公於是復使孟明視等將兵伐晉，戰于彭衙。
秦不利，引兵歸。

translations.literal: Duke Mu then again sent Meng Ming Shi and others to lead troops to attack Jin, fought at Pengya. Qin was unfavorable, withdrew troops and returned.

sentences.zh: 戎王使由余於秦。
由余，其先晉人也，亡入戎，能晉言。
聞繆公賢，故使由余觀秦。
秦繆公示以宮室、積聚。
由余曰：「使鬼為之，則勞神矣。
使人為之，亦苦民矣。」
繆公怪之，問曰：「中國以詩書禮樂法度為政，然尚時亂，今戎夷無此，何以為治，不亦難乎？」
由余笑曰：「此乃中國所以亂也。
夫自上聖黃帝作為禮樂法度，身以先之，僅以小治。
及其後世，日以驕淫。
阻法度之威，以責督於下，下罷極則以仁義怨望於上，上下交爭怨而相篡弒，至於滅宗，皆以此類也。
夫戎夷不然。
上含淳德以遇其下，下懷忠信以事其上，一國之政猶一身之治，不知所以治，此真聖人之治也。」
於是繆公退而問內史廖曰：「孤聞鄰國有聖人，敵國之憂也。
今由余賢，寡人之害，將奈之何？」
內史廖曰：「戎王處辟匿，未聞中國之聲。
君試遺其女樂，以奪其志；
為由余請，以疏其閒；
留而莫遣，以失其期。
戎王怪之，必疑由余。
君臣有閒，乃可虜也。
且戎王好樂，必怠於政。」
繆公曰：「善。」
因與由余曲席而坐，傳器而食，問其地形與其兵勢盡察，而後令內史廖以女樂二八遺戎王。
戎王受而說之，終年不還。
於是秦乃歸由余。
由余數諫不聽，繆公又數使人閒要由余，由余遂去降秦。
繆公以客禮禮之，問伐戎之形。

translations.literal: The Rong king sent You Yu to Qin. You Yu, his ancestors were Jin people, fled into the Rong, could speak Jin language. Heard Duke Mu was worthy, so sent You Yu to observe Qin. Duke Mu of Qin showed him palaces and storehouses. You Yu said: 'If ghosts made them, it would tire the spirits. If people made them, it would exhaust the people.' Duke Mu was surprised, asked: 'China uses poetry, books, ritual, music, and laws to govern, yet still has frequent disorder; now the Rong and Di have none of this, how do they govern, is it not difficult?' You Yu laughed, said: 'This is precisely why China is chaotic. Since the supreme sage Yellow Emperor created ritual, music, and laws, leading by example, barely achieved minor order. By later generations, daily becoming more arrogant and licentious. They rely on the majesty of laws to demand and supervise below; below exhausted to the extreme then use benevolence and righteousness to resent and look up at above; above and below contend in resentment and mutually usurp and assassinate, even to the point of destroying clans, all of this type. The Rong and Di are not like this. Above embraces pure virtue to treat below, below harbors loyalty and faith to serve above; a state's governance is like one body's order, not knowing how it is governed, this is truly the sage's governance.' Therefore Duke Mu withdrew and asked Interior Scribe Liao: 'I have heard that a neighboring state having a sage is an enemy state's worry. Now You Yu is worthy, my harm, what shall I do about it?' Interior Scribe Liao said: 'The Rong king lives in remote seclusion, has not heard China's sounds. Your majesty try sending him female musicians, to seize his will; make requests for You Yu, to widen the gap between them; keep him and don't send him back, to miss his deadline. The Rong king will find it strange, will certainly suspect You Yu. When ruler and minister have a rift, then they can be captured. Moreover the Rong king loves music, will certainly be remiss in governance.' Duke Mu said: 'Good.' Therefore sat with You Yu on curved mats, passed vessels and ate, questioned thoroughly about their terrain and military strength, and then ordered Interior Scribe Liao to send the Rong king sixteen female musicians. The Rong king received them and was delighted, stayed a whole year without returning. Therefore Qin then returned You Yu. You Yu repeatedly admonished but was not listened to, Duke Mu repeatedly sent people to intercept and urge You Yu, You Yu then left and defected to Qin. Duke Mu treated him with guest courtesy, questioned about the strategy for attacking the Rong.

sentences.zh: 三十六年，繆公復益厚孟明等，使將兵伐晉，渡河焚船，大敗晉人，取王官及鄗，以報殽之役。
晉人皆城守不敢出。
於是繆公乃自茅津渡河，封殽中尸，為發喪，哭之三日。
乃誓於軍曰：「嗟士卒！
聽無譁，余誓告汝。
古之人謀黃髪番番，則無所過。」
以申思不用蹇叔、百里傒之謀，故作此誓，令後世以記余過。
君子聞之，皆為垂涕，曰：「嗟乎！
秦繆公之與人周也，卒得孟明之慶。」

translations.literal: Thirty-sixth year, Duke Mu again treated Meng Ming and others generously, had them lead troops to attack Jin, crossed the Yellow River and burned the boats, greatly defeated the Jin people, took Wangguan and Xiang, to avenge the Xiao defeat. The Jin people all defended their cities and dared not come out. Therefore Duke Mu personally crossed the Yellow River at Maojin, buried the corpses in Xiao, held mourning rites, wept for three days. He swore to the army saying: 'Alas, soldiers! Listen without clamor, I swear to tell you. The ancients planned with white-haired elders, then had no errors.' To show I reflect on not using Jian Shu and Bai Li Xi's plans, therefore I make this oath, to let later generations remember my errors. Gentlemen who heard of it all shed tears, saying: 'Alas! Duke Mu of Qin's dealings with people are so magnanimous, in the end he received Meng Ming's blessings.'

sentences.zh: 三十七年，秦用由余謀伐戎王，益國十二，開地千里，遂霸西戎。
天子使召公過賀繆公以金鼓。
三十九年，繆公卒，葬雍。
從死者百七十七人，秦之良臣子輿氏三人名曰奄息、仲行、鍼虎，亦在從死之中。
秦人哀之，為作歌黃鳥之詩。
君子曰：「秦繆公廣地益國，東服彊晉，西霸戎夷，然不為諸侯盟主，亦宜哉。
死而棄民，收其良臣而從死。
且先王崩，尚猶遺德垂法，況奪之善人良臣百姓所哀者乎？
是以知秦不能復東征也。」
繆公子四十人，其太子嵤代立，是為康公。

translations.literal: Thirty-seventh year, Qin used You Yu's plan to attack the Rong king, increased the state by twelve, opened territory a thousand li, thus became hegemon of the western Rong. The Son of Heaven sent Zhao Gong to congratulate Duke Mu with metal drums. Thirty-ninth year, Duke Mu died, buried at Yong. Those who followed in death were 177 people, Qin's worthy ministers the Zi Yu clan three men named Yan Xi, Zhong Xing, Zhen Hu, also among those who followed in death. The Qin people grieved for them, composed the song 'Yellow Bird' poem. The gentleman said: 'Duke Mu of Qin expanded territory and strengthened the state, east he subjugated strong Jin, west he became hegemon over the Rong barbarians, yet he did not become the feudal lords' alliance leader, this is also fitting. Dead and abandoning the people, taking their worthy ministers to follow in death. Moreover, when former kings passed away, they still left behind virtue and transmitted laws, how much more so depriving them of good people and worthy ministers whom the common people grieved for? This is why we know Qin cannot again campaign east.' Duke Mu had forty sons, his crown prince Ying succeeded, this was Duke Kang.

sentences.zh: 康公元年。
往歲繆公之卒，晉襄公亦卒；
襄公之弟名雍，秦出也，在秦。
晉趙盾欲立之，使隨會來迎雍，秦以兵送至令狐。
晉立襄公子而反擊秦師，秦師敗，隨會來奔。
二年，秦伐晉，取武城，報令狐之役。
四年，晉伐秦，取少梁。
六年，秦伐晉，取羈馬。
戰於河曲，大敗晉軍。
晉人患隨會在秦為亂，乃使魏讎餘詳反，合謀會，詐而得會，會遂歸晉。
康公立十二年卒，子共公立。

translations.literal: Duke Kang first year. The previous year Duke Mu died, Jin Duke Xiang also died; Duke Xiang's younger brother named Yong, born of Qin mother, was in Qin. Jin Zhao Dun wanted to establish him, sent Sui Hui to welcome Yong, Qin sent troops to escort to Linghu. Jin established Duke Xiang's son instead and counterattacked Qin troops, Qin troops defeated, Sui Hui came fleeing. Second year, Qin attacked Jin, took Wucheng, to avenge Linghu campaign. Fourth year, Jin attacked Qin, took Shaoliang. Sixth year, Qin attacked Jin, took Jima. Fought at Hequ, greatly defeated Jin army. Jin people worried Sui Hui in Qin would cause disorder, so sent Wei Chou Yu to feign defection, conspired with Hui, tricked and got Hui, Hui then returned to Jin. Duke Kang ruled twelve years and died, son Duke Gong ascended.

sentences.zh: 共公二年，晉趙穿弒其君靈公。
三年，楚莊王彊，北兵至雒，問周鼎。
共公立五年卒，子桓公立。

translations.literal: Duke Gong second year, Jin Zhao Chuan assassinated his ruler Duke Ling. Third year, Chu King Zhuang grew strong, northern troops reached Luo, questioned about Zhou tripods. Duke Gong ruled five years and died, son Duke Huan ascended.

sentences.zh: 桓公三年，晉敗我一將。
十年，楚莊王服鄭，北敗晉兵於河上。
當是之時，楚霸，為會盟合諸侯。
二十四年，晉厲公初立，與秦桓公夾河而盟。
歸而秦倍盟，與翟合謀擊晉。
二十六年，晉率諸侯伐秦，秦軍敗走，追至涇而還。
桓公立二十七年卒，子景公立。

translations.literal: Duke Huan third year, Jin defeated one of our generals. Tenth year, Chu King Zhuang subdued Zheng, north defeated Jin troops on the Yellow River. At this time, Chu was hegemon, held assembly alliances uniting the feudal lords. Twenty-fourth year, Jin Duke Li newly ascended, made alliance with Qin Duke Huan across the river. Returned and Qin broke the alliance, conspired with Di to attack Jin. Twenty-sixth year, Jin led feudal lords to attack Qin, Qin army defeated and fled, pursued to Jing and returned. Duke Huan ruled twenty-seven years and died, son Duke Jing ascended.

sentences.zh: 景公四年，晉欒書弒其君厲公。
十五年，救鄭，敗晉兵於櫟。
是時晉悼公為盟主。
十八年，晉悼公彊，數會諸侯，率以伐秦，敗秦軍。
秦軍走，晉兵追之，遂渡涇，至棫林而還。
二十七年，景公如晉，與平公盟，已而背之。
三十六年，楚公子圍弒其君而自立，是為靈王。
景公母弟後子鍼有寵，景公母弟富，或譖之，恐誅，乃奔晉，車重千乘。
晉平公曰：「后子富如此，何以自亡？」
對曰：「秦公無道，畏誅，欲待其後世乃歸。」
三十九年，楚靈王彊，會諸侯於申，為盟主，殺齊慶封。
景公立四十年卒，子哀公立。
后子復來歸秦。

translations.literal: Duke Jing fourth year, Jin Luan Shu assassinated his ruler Duke Li. Fifteenth year, rescued Zheng, defeated Jin troops at Yue. At this time Jin Duke Dao was alliance leader. Eighteenth year, Jin Duke Dao grew strong, frequently assembled feudal lords, led them to attack Qin, defeated Qin army. Qin army fled, Jin troops pursued them, then crossed Jing, reached Yu forest and returned. Twenty-seventh year, Duke Jing went to Jin, made alliance with Duke Ping, then broke it. Thirty-sixth year, Chu noble Gongzi Wei assassinated his ruler and established himself, this was King Ling. Duke Jing's mother's younger brother Hou Zi Qian had favor, Duke Jing's mother's younger brother Fu, someone slandered him, fearing execution, fled to Jin, with a thousand chariot train. Jin Duke Ping said: 'Hou Zi is so wealthy, why bring about his own destruction?' Replied: 'The Qin ruler is without the Way, fear execution, want to wait for his later generations then return.' Thirty-ninth year, Chu King Ling grew strong, assembled feudal lords at Shen, became alliance leader, killed Qi Qing Feng. Duke Jing ruled forty years and died, son Duke Ai ascended. Hou Zi again came back to Qin.

sentences.zh: 哀公八年，楚公子棄疾弒靈王而自立，是為平王。
十一年，楚平王來求秦女為太子建妻。
至國，女好而自娶之。
十五年，楚平王欲誅建，建亡；
伍子胥奔吳。
晉公室卑而六卿彊，欲內相攻，是以久秦晉不相攻。
三十一年，吳王闔閭與伍子胥伐楚，楚王亡奔隨，吳遂入郢。
楚大夫申包胥來告急，七日不食，日夜哭泣。
於是秦乃發五百乘救楚，敗吳師。
吳師歸，楚昭王乃得復入郢。
哀公立三十六年卒。
太子夷公，夷公蚤死，不得立，立夷公子，是為惠公。

translations.literal: Duke Ai eighth year, Chu noble Gongzi Qi Ji assassinated King Ling and established himself, this was King Ping. Eleventh year, Chu King Ping came requesting Qin woman as wife for Crown Prince Jian. Upon reaching the state, the woman was beautiful so personally married her. Fifteenth year, Chu King Ping wanted to execute Jian, Jian fled; Wu Zixu fled to Wu. The Jin ducal house was weak while the six ministers were strong, desiring to attack each other internally, therefore for a long time Qin and Jin did not attack each other. Thirty-first year, Wu king He Lu and Wu Zixu attacked Chu, Chu king fled to Sui, Wu then entered Ying. Chu minister Shen Bao Xu came to seek urgent help, seven days without eating, day and night weeping. Therefore Qin sent 500 chariots to rescue Chu, defeated the Wu army. The Wu army returned, Chu King Zhao was then able to re-enter Ying. Duke Ai ruled thirty-six years and died. Crown prince Yi Gong, Yi Gong died early, could not ascend, established Yi Gong's son, this was Duke Hui.

sentences.zh: 惠公元年，孔子行魯相事。
五年，晉卿中行、范氏反晉，晉使智氏、趙簡子攻之，范、中行氏亡奔齊。
惠公立十年卒，子悼公立。

translations.literal: Duke Hui of Qin first year, Confucius acted as prime minister of Lu. Fifth year, Jin ministers Zhonghang and Fan clans rebelled against Jin, Jin sent Zhi clan and Zhao Jian Zi to attack them, Fan and Zhonghang clans fled to Qi. Duke Hui ruled ten years and died, son Duke Dao ascended.

sentences.zh: 悼公二年，齊臣田乞弒其君孺子，立其兄陽生，是為悼公。
六年，吳敗齊師。
齊人弒悼公，立其子簡公。
九年，晉定公與吳王夫差盟，爭長於黃池，卒先吳。
吳彊，陵中國。
十二年，齊田常弒簡公，立其弟平公，常相之。
十三年，楚滅陳。
秦悼公立十四年卒，子厲共公立。
孔子以悼公十二年卒。

translations.literal: Duke Dao second year, Qi minister Tian Qi assassinated his lord Ruzi, established his elder brother Yang Sheng, this was Duke Dao. Sixth year, Wu defeated Qi army. Qi people assassinated Duke Dao, established his son Duke Jian. Ninth year, Jin Duke Ding allied with Wu king Fu Chai, contended for precedence at Huangchi, finally yielded to Wu. Wu was strong, bullied the central states. Twelfth year, Qi Tian Chang assassinated Duke Jian, established his younger brother Duke Ping, Chang became prime minister. Thirteenth year, Chu destroyed Chen. Qin Duke Dao ruled fourteen years and died, son Duke Li Gong ascended. Confucius died in Duke Dao's twelfth year.

sentences.zh: 厲共公二年，蜀人來賂。
十六年，塹河旁。
以兵二萬伐大荔，取其王城。
二十一年，初縣頻陽。
晉取武成。
二十四年，晉亂，殺智伯，分其國與趙、韓、魏。
二十五年，智開與邑人來奔。
三十三年，伐義渠，虜其王。
三十四年，日食。
厲共公卒，子躁公立。

translations.literal: Duke Li Gong second year, Shu people came with tribute. Sixteenth year, dug moats along the river bank. With 20,000 troops attacked Dali, took its royal city. Twenty-first year, first established Pinyang county. Jin took Wucheng. Twenty-fourth year, Jin disorder, killed Zhi Bo, divided his state among Zhao, Han, Wei. Twenty-fifth year, Zhi Kai and townspeople came fleeing. Thirty-third year, attacked Yiqu, captured its king. Thirty-fourth year, solar eclipse. Duke Li Gong died, son Duke Zhao ascended.

sentences.zh: 躁公二年，南鄭反。
十三年，義渠來伐，至渭南。
十四年，躁公卒，立其弟懷公。

translations.literal: Duke Zhao second year, Nanzheng rebelled. Thirteenth year, Yiqu came to attack, reached south of Wei River. Fourteenth year, Duke Zhao died, established his younger brother Duke Hui.

sentences.zh: 懷公四年，庶長朝與大臣圍懷公，懷公自殺。
懷公太子曰昭子，蚤死，大臣乃立太子昭子之子，是為靈公。
靈公，懷公孫也。

translations.literal: Duke Hui fourth year, Senior Grand Master Zhao and ministers surrounded Duke Hui, Duke Hui committed suicide. Duke Hui's crown prince was called Zhao Zi, died early, ministers then established Crown Prince Zhao Zi's son, this was Duke Ling. Duke Ling was Duke Hui's grandson.

sentences.zh: 靈公六年，晉城少梁，秦擊之。
十三年，城籍姑。
靈公卒，子獻公不得立，立靈公季父悼子，是為簡公。
簡公，昭子之弟而懷公子也。

translations.literal: Duke Ling sixth year, Jin fortified Shaoliang, Qin attacked it. Thirteenth year, fortified Jigu. Duke Ling died, son Duke Xian could not ascend, established Duke Ling's youngest uncle Dao Zi, this was Duke Jian. Duke Jian was Zhao Zi's younger brother and Duke Hui's son.

sentences.zh: 簡公六年，令吏初帶劍。
塹洛。
城重泉。
十六年卒，子惠公立。

translations.literal: Duke Jian sixth year, first ordered officials to wear swords. Dug moats at Luo. Fortified Chongquan. Sixteenth year died, son Duke Hui ascended.

sentences.zh: 惠公十二年，子出子生。
十三年，伐蜀，取南鄭。
惠公卒，出子立。

translations.literal: Duke Hui twelfth year, son Chu Zi born. Thirteenth year, attacked Shu, took Nanzheng. Duke Hui died, Chu Zi ascended.

sentences.zh: 出子二年，庶長改迎靈公之子獻公于河西而立之。
殺出子及其母，沈之淵旁。
秦以往者數易君，君臣乖亂，故晉復彊，奪秦河西地。

translations.literal: Chu Zi second year, Senior Grand Master Gai welcomed Duke Ling's son Duke Xian from west of Yellow River and established him. Killed Chu Zi and his mother, drowned them by the deep pool. Qin in past frequently changed rulers, ruler and ministers in disorder, therefore Jin again grew strong, seized Qin's territory west of Yellow River.

sentences.zh: 獻公元年，止從死。
二年，城櫟陽。
四年正月庚寅，孝公生。
十一年，周太史儋見獻公曰：「周故與秦國合而別，別五百歲復合，合（七）十七歲而霸王出。」
十六年，桃冬花。
十八年，雨金櫟陽。
二十一年，與晉戰於石門，斬首六萬，天子賀以黼黻。
二十三年，與魏晉戰少梁，虜其將公孫痤。
二十四年，獻公卒，子孝公立，年已二十一歲矣。

translations.literal: Duke Xian first year, stopped accompanying in death. Second year, fortified Yueyang. Fourth year first month Gengyin day, Duke Xiao born. Eleventh year, Zhou Grand Historian Dan saw Duke Xian, said: 'Zhou originally united with Qin state then separated, separated 500 years will reunite, reunite seventeen years and hegemon king will emerge.' Sixteenth year, peach trees flowered in winter. Eighteenth year, rained gold at Yueyang. Twenty-first year, fought with Jin at Shimen, beheaded 60,000, Son of Heaven congratulated with black and white patterned silk. Twenty-third year, fought with Wei Jin at Shaoliang, captured their general Gongsun Zao. Twenty-fourth year, Duke Xian died, son Duke Xiao ascended, already twenty-one years old.

sentences.zh: 孝公元年，河山以東彊國六，與齊威、楚宣、魏惠、燕悼、韓哀、趙成侯并。
淮泗之閒小國十餘。
楚、魏與秦接界。
魏筑長城，自鄭濱洛以北，有上郡。
楚自漢中，南有巴、黔中。
周室微，諸侯力政，爭相併。
秦僻在雍州，不與中國諸侯之會盟，夷翟遇之。
孝公於是布惠，振孤寡，招戰士，明功賞。
下令國中曰：「昔我繆公自岐雍之閒，修德行武，東平晉亂，以河為界，西霸戎翟，廣地千里，天子致伯，諸侯畢賀，為後世開業，甚光美。
會往者厲、躁、簡公、出子之不寧，國家內憂，未遑外事，三晉攻奪我先君河西地，諸侯卑秦、醜莫大焉。
獻公即位，鎮撫邊境，徙治櫟陽，且欲東伐，復繆公之故地，修繆公之政令。
寡人思念先君之意，常痛於心。
賓客群臣有能出奇計彊秦者，吾且尊官，與之分土。」
於是乃出兵東圍陜城，西斬戎之獂王。

translations.literal: Duke Xiao first year, east of rivers and mountains strong states six, with Qi Wei, Chu Xuan, Wei Hui, Yan Dao, Han Ai, Zhao Cheng Hou stood equally. Between Huai and Si small states more than ten. Chu and Wei bordered Qin. Wei built the Great Wall, from Zheng north along the Luo, had Shang commandery. Chu from Hanzhong south had Ba and Qianzhong. The Zhou house was weak, the lords governed by force, contended to annex each other. Qin was remote in Yong province, did not participate in the alliances of the central states lords, treated as Rong and Di. Duke Xiao then spread benevolence, aided orphans and widows, recruited warriors, clarified merit rewards. Issued command in the state: 'In ancient times, our Duke Mu from between Qi and Yong, cultivated virtue and practiced military affairs, pacified Jin's disorders to the east with the Yellow River as boundary, became hegemon of the western Rong and Di, expanded territory a thousand li, the Son of Heaven granted hegemony, all lords congratulated, opened enterprises for later generations, extremely glorious and beautiful. Encountering in the past the unrest of Li, Zhao, Jian, and Chu Zi, the state had internal worries, no leisure for external affairs, the three Jin attacked and seized our former lord's Hexi lands, the lords belittled Qin, no shame greater than this. Duke Xian ascended, pacified the borders, moved the capital to Queyang, and wished to attack east, recover Duke Mu's former lands, follow Duke Mu's policies. I think of our former lord's intentions, constantly pained in my heart. Guests and ministers who can put forth extraordinary plans to strengthen Qin, I will honor with office and divide land with them.' Therefore sent troops east to besiege Xia city, west beheaded the Rong's Mi Wang.

sentences.zh: 衛鞅聞是令下，西入秦，因景監求見孝公。

translations.literal: Wei Yang heard this command was issued, entered Qin from the west, through Jing Jian sought to see Duke Xiao.

sentences.zh: 二年，天子致胙。

translations.literal: Second year, the Son of Heaven sent sacrificial meat.

sentences.zh: 三年，衛鞅說孝公變法修刑，內務耕稼，外勸戰死之賞罰，孝公善之。
甘龍、杜摯等弗然，相與爭之。
卒用鞅法，百姓苦之；
居三年，百姓便之。
乃拜鞅為左庶長。
其事在商君語中。

translations.literal: Third year, Wei Yang persuaded Duke Xiao to change laws and reform punishments, internally focus on farming, externally encourage rewards and punishments for battle deaths, Duke Xiao approved it. Gan Long, Du Zhi and others disagreed, disputed with each other about it. In the end used Yang's laws, the common people suffered from them; After three years, the common people became accustomed to them. Then appointed Yang as Left Senior Grand Master. His affairs are in the Shang Jun chapter.

sentences.zh: 七年，與魏惠王會杜平。
八年，與魏戰元裏，有功。
十年，衛鞅為大良造，將兵圍魏安邑，降之。
十二年，作為咸陽，筑冀闕，秦徙都之。
并諸小鄉聚，集為大縣，縣一令，四十一縣。
為田開阡陌。
東地渡洛。
十四年，初為賦。
十九年，天子致伯。
二十年，諸侯畢賀。
秦使公子少官率師會諸侯逢澤，朝天子。

translations.literal: Seventh year, met with Wei Hui Wang at Du Ping. Eighth year, fought with Wei at Yuanli, had merit. Tenth year, Wei Yang became Grand Commandant, led troops to besiege Wei's Anyi, captured it. Twelfth year, built Xianyang, constructed Ji Que, Qin moved capital there. Merged various small townships and settlements, assembled into large counties, each county one magistrate, forty-one counties. For fields opened the qian mo. Eastern lands crossed the Luo. Fourteenth year, first established land tax. Nineteenth year, Son of Heaven granted hegemony. Twentieth year, all lords congratulated. Qin sent Prince Shao Guan to lead troops to meet the lords at Feng Ze, attend the Son of Heaven.

sentences.zh: 二十一年，齊敗魏馬陵。

translations.literal: Twenty-first year, Qi defeated Wei at Ma Ling.

sentences.zh: 二十二年，衛鞅擊魏，虜魏公子卬。
封鞅為列侯，號商君。

translations.literal: Twenty-second year, Wei Yang attacked Wei, captured Wei prince Ang. Enfeoffed Yang as Lie Hou, titled Lord Shang.

sentences.zh: 二十四年，與晉戰雁門，虜其將魏錯。

translations.literal: Twenty-fourth year, fought with Jin at Yanmen, captured their general Wei Cuo.

sentences.zh: 孝公卒，子惠文君立。
是歲，誅衛鞅。
鞅之初為秦施法，法不行，太子犯禁。
鞅曰：「法之不行，自於貴戚。
君必欲行法，先於太子。
太子不可黥，黥其傅師。」
於是法大用，秦人治。
及孝公卒，太子立，宗室多怨鞅，鞅亡，因以為反，而卒車裂以徇秦國。

translations.literal: Duke Xiao died, son Duke Huiwen ascended. This year, executed Wei Yang. When Yang first implemented laws for Qin, laws did not work, crown prince violated prohibitions. Yang said: 'The laws not working comes from the nobles and relatives. If you lord must implement laws, start with the crown prince. Crown prince cannot be tattooed, tattoo his tutors and teachers.' Therefore laws greatly used, Qin people orderly. When Duke Xiao died, crown prince ascended, imperial clan many resented Yang, Yang fled, therefore accused of rebellion, and finally torn apart by chariots to parade through Qin state.

sentences.zh: 惠文君元年，楚、韓、趙、蜀人來朝。
二年，天子賀。
三年，王冠。
四年，天子致文武胙。
齊、魏為王。

translations.literal: Duke Huiwen first year, Chu, Han, Zhao, Shu people came to court. Second year, Son of Heaven congratulated. Third year, king crowned. Fourth year, Son of Heaven sent civil and military sacrificial meat. Qi, Wei became kings.

sentences.zh: 五年，陰晉人犀首為大良造。
六年，魏納陰晉，陰晉更名寧秦。
七年，公子卬與魏戰，虜其將龍賈，斬首八萬。
八年，魏納河西地。
九年，渡河，取汾陰、皮氏。
與魏王會應。
圍焦，降之。
十年，張儀相秦。
魏納上郡十五縣。
十一年，縣義渠。
歸魏焦、曲沃。
義渠君為臣。
更名少梁曰夏陽。
十二年，初臘。
十三年四月戊午，魏君為王，韓亦為王。
使張儀伐取陜，出其人與魏。

translations.literal: Fifth year, Yinjin man Xi Shou became Grand Commandant. Sixth year, Wei ceded Yinjin, Yinjin renamed Ningqin. Seventh year, Prince Ang fought with Wei, captured their general Long Jia, beheaded 80,000. Eighth year, Wei ceded Hexi lands. Ninth year, crossed Yellow River, took Fenyin, Pishi. Met with Wei king at Ying. Besieged Jiao, captured it. Tenth year, Zhang Yi became Chancellor of Qin. Wei ceded fifteen counties of Shang commandery. Eleventh year, established county of Yiqiu. Returned Jiao and Quwo to Wei. Yiqiu lord became subject. Renamed Shaoliang to Xiayang. Twelfth year, first La sacrifice. Thirteenth year fourth month day wuwu, Wei ruler became king, Han also became king. Sent Zhang Yi to attack and take Xia, moved its people to Wei.

sentences.zh: 十四年，更為元年。
二年，張儀與齊、楚大臣會齧桑。
三年，韓、魏太子來朝。
張儀相魏。
五年，王游至北河。
七年，樂池相秦。
韓、趙、魏、燕、齊帥匈奴共攻秦。
秦使庶長疾與戰修魚，虜其將申差，敗趙公子渴、韓太子奐，斬首八萬二千。
八年，張儀復相秦。
九年，司馬錯伐蜀，滅之。
伐取趙中都、西陽十年，韓太子蒼來質。
伐取韓石章。
伐敗趙將泥。
伐取義渠二十五城。
十一年，摢裏疾攻魏焦，降之。
敗韓岸門，斬首萬，其將犀首走。
公子通封於蜀。
燕君讓其臣子之。
十二年，王與梁王會臨晉。
庶長疾攻趙，虜趙將莊。
張儀相楚。
十三年，庶長章擊楚於丹陽，虜其將屈丐，斬首八萬；
又攻楚漢中，取地六百里，置漢中郡。
楚圍雍氏，秦使庶長疾助韓而東攻齊，到滿助魏攻燕。
十四年，伐楚，取召陵。
丹、犁臣，蜀相壯殺蜀侯來降。

translations.literal: Fourteenth year, changed to first year. Second year, Zhang Yi met with Qi and Chu ministers at Ni Sang. Third year, Han and Wei crown princes came to court. Zhang Yi became prime minister of Wei. Fifth year, the king toured to Beihe. Seventh year, Yue Chi became prime minister of Qin. Han, Zhao, Wei, Yan, Qi led the Xiongnu to attack Qin together. Qin sent Senior Minister Ji to battle at Xiuyu, captured their general Shen Chai, defeated Zhao prince Ke and Han crown prince Huan, beheaded 82,000. Eighth year, Zhang Yi again became prime minister of Qin. Ninth year, Sima Cuo attacked Shu, destroyed it. Attacked and took Zhao's Zhongdu, Xiyang. Tenth year, Han crown prince Cang came as hostage. Attacked and took Han's Shizhang. Attacked and defeated Zhao general Ni. Attacked and took twenty-five Yiqiu cities. Eleventh year, Li Ji attacked Wei's Jiao, captured it. Defeated Han at Anmen, beheaded 10,000, their general Xi Shou fled. Prince Tong enfeoffed in Shu. Yan lord yielded his minister Zi Zhi. Twelfth year, king met with Liang king at Linjin. Senior Minister Ji attacked Zhao, captured Zhao general Zhuang. Zhang Yi became prime minister of Chu. Thirteenth year, Senior Minister Zhang attacked Chu at Danyang, captured their general Qu Gai, beheaded 80,000; Again attacked Chu's Hanzhong, took 600 li of land, established Hanzhong commandery. Chu besieged Yongshi, Qin sent Senior Minister Ji to aid Han and attack Qi to the east, Dao Man aided Wei to attack Yan. Fourteenth year, attacked Chu, took Shaoling. Dan, Li submitted, Shu chancellor Zhuang killed Shu lord and came to surrender.

sentences.zh: 惠王卒，子武王立。
韓、魏、齊、楚、越皆賓從。

translations.literal: Duke Hui died, son Duke Wu ascended. Han, Wei, Qi, Chu, Yue all submitted as guests.

sentences.zh: 武王元年，與魏惠王會臨晉。
誅蜀相壯。
張儀、魏章皆東出之魏。
伐義渠、丹、犁。
二年，初置丞相，摢裏疾、甘茂為左右丞相。
張儀死於魏。
三年，與韓襄王會臨晉外。
南公揭卒，摢裏疾相韓。
武王謂甘茂曰：「寡人欲容車通三川，窺周室，死不恨矣。」
其秋，使甘茂、庶長封伐宜陽。
四年，拔宜陽，斬首六萬。
涉河，城武遂。
魏太子來朝。
武王有力好戲，力士任鄙、烏獲、孟說皆至大官。
王與孟說舉鼎，絕臏。
八月，武王死。
族孟說。
武王取魏女為后，無子。
立異母弟，是為昭襄王。
昭襄母楚人，姓羋氏，號宣太后。
武王死時，昭襄王為質於燕，燕人送歸，得立。

translations.literal: Duke Wu first year, met with Wei Hui Wang at Linjin. Executed Shu chancellor Zhuang. Zhang Yi, Wei Zhang both sent east to Wei. Attacked Yiqiu, Dan, Li. Second year, first established chancellor position, Li Ji and Gan Mao became left and right chancellors. Zhang Yi died in Wei. Third year, met with Han Xiang Wang outside Linjin. Nan Gong Jie died, Li Ji became prime minister of Han. Duke Wu said to Gan Mao: 'I wish to have chariots pass through the three river valleys, gaze upon the Zhou house, then die without regret.' That autumn, sent Gan Mao and Senior Minister Feng to attack Yiyang. Fourth year, captured Yiyang, beheaded 60,000. Crossed the Yellow River, fortified Wusui. Wei crown prince came to court. Duke Wu was strong and fond of games, strongmen Ren Bi, Wu Huo, Meng Yue all reached high office. The king competed with Meng Yue in lifting the ding tripod, ruptured his kneecap. Eighth month, Duke Wu died. Executed Meng Yue and his entire clan. Duke Wu took a Wei woman as queen, had no sons. Established different mother younger brother, this was Duke Zhaoxiang. Duke Zhaoxiang's mother was Chu person, surname Mi, titled Xuan Dowager. When Duke Wu died, Duke Zhaoxiang was hostage in Yan, Yan people sent him back, thus was established.

sentences.zh: 昭襄王元年，嚴君疾為相。
甘茂出之魏。
二年，彗星見。
庶長壯與大臣、諸侯、公子為逆，皆誅，及惠文后皆不得良死。
悼武王后出歸魏。
三年，王冠。
與楚王會黃棘，與楚上庸。
四年，取蒲阪。
彗星見。
五年，魏王來朝應亭，復與魏蒲阪。
六年，蜀侯煇反，司馬錯定蜀。
庶長奐伐楚，斬首二萬。
涇陽君質於齊。
日食，晝晦。
七年，拔新城。
摢裏子卒。
八年，使將軍羋戎攻楚，取新市。
齊使章子，魏使公孫喜，韓使暴鳶共攻楚方城，取唐眛。
趙破中山，其君亡，竟死齊。
魏公子勁、韓公子長為諸侯。
九年，孟嘗君薛文來相秦。
奐攻楚，取八城，殺其將景快。
十年，楚懷王入朝秦，秦留之。
薛文以金受免。
樓緩為丞相。
十一年，齊、韓、魏、趙、宋、中山五國共攻秦，至鹽氏而還。
秦與韓、魏河北及封陵以和。
彗星見。
楚懷王走之趙，趙不受，還之秦，即死，歸葬。
十二年，樓緩免，穰侯魏冉為相。
予楚粟五萬石。

translations.literal: Duke Zhaoxiang first year, Yan Jun Ji became chancellor. Gan Mao went out to Wei. Second year, comet appeared. Senior Minister Zhuang with ministers, lords, princes rebelled, all executed, and Duke Huiwen's queen all did not die good deaths. Dao Duke Wu's queen went out and returned to Wei. Third year, king crowned. Met with Chu king at Huang Ji, ceded Shangyong to Chu. Fourth year, took Puban. Comet appeared. Fifth year, Wei king came to court at Yingting, returned Puban to Wei. Sixth year, Shu lord Hui rebelled, Sima Cuo pacified Shu. Senior Minister Huan attacked Chu, beheaded 20,000. Jingyang Jun went as hostage to Qi. Solar eclipse, day darkened. Seventh year, took Xincheng. Mang Li Zi died. Eighth year, sent General Mi Yong to attack Chu, took Xinshi. Qi sent Zhang Zi, Wei sent Gongsun Xi, Han sent Bao Yuan together attacked Chu Fangcheng, took Tangmei. Zhao destroyed Zhongshan, its ruler fled, finally died in Qi. Wei prince Jing, Han prince Chang became lords. Ninth year, Lord Mengchang Xue Wen came to be chancellor of Qin. Huan attacked Chu, took eight cities, killed their general Jing Kuai. Tenth year, Chu King Huai entered to court Qin, Qin detained him. Xue Wen took gold and was dismissed. Lou Huan became chancellor. Eleventh year, Qi, Han, Wei, Zhao, Song, Zhongshan five states together attacked Qin, reached Yanshi and returned. Qin and Han, Wei made peace with the land north of Yellow River and Fengling. Comet appeared. Chu King Huai fled to Zhao, Zhao would not accept, returned to Qin, immediately died, returned for burial. Twelfth year, Lou Huan dismissed, Lord Rang Wei Ran became chancellor. Gave Chu 50,000 shi of grain.

sentences.zh: 十三年，向壽伐韓，取武始。
左更白起攻新城。
五大夫禮出亡奔魏。
任鄙為漢中守。
十四年，左更白起攻韓、魏於伊闕，斬首二十四萬，虜公孫喜，拔五城。
十五年，大良造白起攻魏，取垣，復予之。
攻楚，取宛。
十六年，左更錯取軹及鄧。
冉免，封公子市宛，公子悝鄧，魏冉陶，為諸侯。
十七年，城陽君入朝，及東周君來朝。
秦以垣為蒲阪、皮氏。
王之宜陽。
十八年，錯攻垣、河雍，決橋取之。
十九年，王為西帝，齊為東帝，皆復去之。
呂禮來自歸。
齊破宋，宋王在魏，死溫。
任鄙卒。
二十年，王之漢中，又之上郡、北河。
二十一年，錯攻魏河內。
魏獻安邑，秦出其人，募徙河東賜爵，赦罪人遷之。
涇陽君封宛。
二十二年，蒙武伐齊。
河東為九縣。
與楚王會宛。
與趙王會中陽。
二十三年，尉斯離與三晉、燕伐齊，破之濟西。
王與魏王會宜陽，與韓王會新城。
二十四年，與楚王會鄢，又會穰。
秦取魏安城，至大梁，燕、趙救之，秦軍去。
魏冉免相。
二十五年，拔趙二城。
與韓王會新城，與魏王會新明邑。
二十六年，赦罪人遷之穰。
侯冉復相。
二十七年，錯攻楚。
赦罪人遷之南陽。
白起攻趙，取代光狼城。
又使司馬錯發隴西，因蜀攻楚黔中，拔之。
二十八年，大良造白起攻楚，取鄢、鄧，赦罪人遷之。
二十九年，大良造白起攻楚，取郢為南郡，楚王走。
周君來。
王與楚王會襄陵。
白起為武安君。
三十年，蜀守若伐楚，取巫郡，及江南為黔中郡。
三十一年，白起伐魏，取兩城。
楚人反我江南。
三十二年，相穰侯攻魏，至大梁，破暴鳶，斬首四萬，鳶走，魏入三縣請和。
三十三年，客卿胡（傷）［陽］攻魏卷、蔡陽、長社，取之。
擊芒卯華陽，破之，斬首十五萬。
魏入南陽以和。
三十四年，秦與魏、韓上庸地為一郡，南陽免臣遷居之。
三十五年，佐韓、魏、楚伐燕。
初置南陽郡。
三十六年，客卿灶攻齊，取剛、壽，予穰侯。
三十八年，中更胡（傷）［陽］攻趙閼與，不能取。
四十年，悼太子死魏，歸葬芷陽。
四十一年夏，攻魏，取邢丘、懷。
四十二年，安國君為太子。
十月，宣太后薨，葬芷陽酈山。
九月，穰侯出之陶。
四十三年，武安君白起攻韓，拔九城，斬首五萬。
四十四年，攻韓南（郡）［陽］，取之。
四十五年，五大夫賁攻韓，取十城。
葉陽君悝出之國，未至而死。
四十七年，秦攻韓上黨，上黨降趙，秦因攻趙，趙發兵擊秦，相距。
秦使武安君白起擊，大破趙於長平，四十餘萬盡殺之。
四十八年十月，韓獻垣雍。
秦軍分為三軍。
武安君歸。
王龁將伐趙（武安）皮牢，拔之。
司馬梗北定太原，盡有韓上黨。
正月，兵罷，復守上黨。
其十月，五大夫陵攻趙邯鄲。
四十九年正月，益發卒佐陵。
陵戰不善，免，王龁代將。
其十月，將軍張唐攻魏，為蔡尉捐弗守，還斬之。
五十年十月，武安君白起有罪，為士伍，遷陰密。
張唐攻鄭，拔之。
十二月，益發卒軍汾城旁。
武安君白起有罪，死。
龁攻邯鄲，不拔，去，還奔汾軍。
二月餘攻晉軍，斬首六千，晉楚流死河二萬人。
攻汾城，即從唐拔寧新中，寧新中更名安陽。
初作河橋。

translations.literal: Thirteenth year, Xiang Shou attacked Han, took Wushi. Left Minister Bai Qi attacked Xincheng. Grand Master of the Fifth Rank Li fled to Wei. Ren Bi became governor of Hanzhong. Fourteenth year, Left Minister Bai Qi attacked Han and Wei at Yique, beheaded 240,000, captured Gongsun Xi, took five cities. Fifteenth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Wei, took Yuan, then returned it. Attacked Chu, took Wan. Sixteenth year, Left Minister Cuo took Zhi and Deng. Ran dismissed, enfeoffed Prince Shi at Wan, Prince Kui at Deng, Wei Ran at Tao, as lords. Seventeenth year, Lord of Chengyang entered court, and Lord of Eastern Zhou came to court. Qin renamed Yuan as Puban and Pishi. The king went to Yiyang. Eighteenth year, Cuo attacked Yuan and Heyong, broke the bridge and took them. Nineteenth year, king became Western Emperor, Qi became Eastern Emperor, both later abandoned it. Lu Li came from Wei to surrender. Qi destroyed Song, Song king was in Wei, died at Wen. Ren Bi died. Twentieth year, king went to Hanzhong, then went to Shang commandery, Beihe. Twenty-first year, Cuo attacked Wei's Henei. Wei offered Anyi, Qin moved its people out, recruited migrants to Hedong granting noble ranks, pardoned criminals and moved them there. Jingyang Jun enfeoffed at Wan. Twenty-second year, Meng Wu attacked Qi. Hedong made into nine counties. Met with Chu king at Wan. Met with Zhao king at Zhongyang. Twenty-third year, Yu Si Li with three Jin and Yan attacked Qi, defeated them west of Ji. King met with Wei king at Yiyang, met with Han king at Xincheng. Twenty-fourth year, met with Chu king at Yan, again met at Rang. Qin took Wei's Ancheng, reached Daxiang, Yan and Zhao rescued them, Qin army withdrew. Wei Ran dismissed from chancellor. Twenty-fifth year, took two Zhao cities. Met with Han king at Xincheng, met with Wei king at Xinmingyi. Twenty-sixth year, pardoned criminals and moved them to Rang. Hou Ran again became chancellor. Twenty-seventh year, Cuo attacked Chu. Pardoned criminals and moved them to Nanyang. Bai Qi attacked Zhao, took Daiguang Wolf city. Again sent Sima Cuo to mobilize Longxi, through Shu attacked Chu's Qianzhong, captured it. Twenty-eighth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Chu, took Yan, Deng, pardoned criminals and moved them there. Twenty-ninth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Chu, took Ying as Nan commandery, Chu king fled. Zhou lord came. King met with Chu king at Xiangling. Bai Qi became Lord Wu'an. Thirtieth year, Shu governor Ruo attacked Chu, took Wu commandery, and the south of Jiang as Qianzhong commandery. Thirty-first year, Bai Qi attacked Wei, took two cities. Chu people rebelled against our Jiangnan. Thirty-second year, Chancellor Lord Rang attacked Wei, reached Daxiang, defeated Bao Yuan, beheaded 40,000, Yuan fled, Wei ceded three counties to sue for peace. Thirty-third year, Guest Minister Hu Yang attacked Wei's Juan, Caiyang, Changshe, took them. Attacked Mang Mao at Huayang, defeated him, beheaded 150,000. Wei ceded Nanyang to make peace. Thirty-fourth year, Qin with Wei, Han made Shangyong lands into one commandery, Nanyang freed servants moved to live there. Thirty-fifth year, assisted Han, Wei, Chu to attack Yan. First established Nanyang commandery. Thirty-sixth year, Guest Minister Zao attacked Qi, took Gang, Shou, gave to Lord Rang. Thirty-eighth year, Vice Minister Hu Yang attacked Zhao's Eyu, could not take it. Fortieth year, Dao crown prince died in Wei, returned for burial at Zhiyang. Forty-first year summer, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu, Huai. Forty-second year, An Guo Jun became crown prince. Tenth month, Xuan Taihou died, buried at Zhiyang Lishan. Ninth month, Rang Hou was exiled to Tao. Forty-third year, Wu An Jun Bai Qi attacked Han, took nine cities, beheaded 50,000. Forty-fourth year, attacked Han Nanyang, took it. Forty-fifth year, Wu Da Fu Ben attacked Han, took ten cities. Ye Yang Jun Kui was exiled from the state, died before arriving. Forty-seventh year, Qin attacked Han's Shangdang, Shangdang surrendered to Zhao, Qin then attacked Zhao, Zhao sent troops to attack Qin, confronted each other. Qin sent Wu An Jun Bai Qi to attack, greatly defeated Zhao at Changping, over 400,000 all killed. Forty-eighth year tenth month, Han offered Yuanyong. Qin army divided into three armies. Wu An Jun returned. Wang He led attack on Zhao Pijiao, captured it. Sima Geng pacified Taiyuan to the north, completely possessed Han's Shangdang. First month, troops dismissed, again guarded Shangdang. That tenth month, Wu Da Fu Ling attacked Zhao's Handan. Forty-ninth year first month, increased troops to assist Ling. Ling fought poorly, dismissed, Wang He replaced as general. That tenth month, General Zhang Tang attacked Wei, because Cai Wei Quan did not defend, returned and beheaded him. Fiftieth year tenth month, Wu An Jun Bai Qi had crime, demoted to common soldier, exiled to Yinmi. Zhang Tang attacked Zheng, captured it. Twelfth month, increased troops stationed by Fencheng. Wu An Jun Bai Qi had crime, died. He attacked Handan, could not capture, left, returned to join Fen army. Over two months attacked Jin army, beheaded 6,000, Jin Chu drowned in river 20,000 people. Attacked Fencheng, then following Tang captured Ningxinzhong, Ningxinzhong renamed Anyang. First built Yellow River bridge.

sentences.zh: 五十一年，將軍摎攻韓，取陽城、負黍，斬首四萬。
攻趙，取二十餘縣，首虜九萬。
西周君背秦，與諸侯約從，將天下銳兵出伊闕攻秦，令秦毋得通陽城。
於是秦使將軍摎攻西周。
西周君走來自歸，頓首受罪，盡獻其邑三十六城，口三萬。
秦王受獻，歸其君於周。
五十二年，周民東亡，其器九鼎入秦。
周初亡。

translations.literal: Fifty-first year, General Liu attacked Han, took Yangcheng, Fushu, beheaded 40,000. Attacked Zhao, took over twenty counties, heads and captives 90,000. Western Zhou lord betrayed Qin, allied with lords in confederation, led world's elite troops out Yique to attack Qin, ordered Qin not to pass Yangcheng. Therefore Qin sent General Liu to attack Western Zhou. Western Zhou lord fled and came to surrender, kowtowed to receive punishment, completely offered his cities thirty-six, population 30,000. Qin king accepted offering, returned his lord to Zhou. Fifty-second year, Zhou people fled east, their vessels nine ding entered Qin. Zhou first perished.

sentences.zh: 五十三年，天下來賓。
魏後，秦使摎伐魏，取吳城。
韓王入朝，魏委國聽令。
五十四年，王郊見上帝於雍。
五十六年秋，昭襄王卒，子孝文王立。
尊唐八子為唐太后，而合其葬於先王。
韓王衰绖入弔祠，諸侯皆使其將相來弔祠，視喪事。

translations.literal: Fifty-third year, world came as guests. Wei last, Qin sent Liu to attack Wei, took Wucheng. Han king entered court, Wei entrusted state to obey commands. Fifty-fourth year, king performed suburban sacrifice to see Shangdi at Yong. Fifty-sixth year autumn, Duke Zhaoxiang died, son King Xiaowen ascended. Honored Tang Bazhi as Tang Dowager, and combined her burial with the former kings. Han king in mourning clothes entered to offer condolences and sacrifices, all lords sent their generals and chancellors to offer condolences and sacrifices, oversee funeral affairs.

sentences.zh: 孝文王元年，赦罪人，修先王功臣，褒厚親戚，弛苑囿。
孝文王除喪，十月己亥即位，三日辛醜卒，子莊襄王立。

translations.literal: King Xiaowen first year, pardoned criminals, honored former kings' meritorious ministers, rewarded relatives generously, relaxed hunting parks. King Xiaowen ended mourning, tenth month Jihai day ascended throne, three days Xinchou day died, son King Zhuangxiang ascended.

sentences.zh: 莊襄王元年，大赦罪人，修先王功臣，施德厚骨肉而布惠於民。
東周君與諸侯謀秦，秦使相國呂不韋誅之，盡入其國。
秦不絕其祀，以陽人地賜周君，奉其祭祀。
使蒙驁伐韓，韓獻成皋、鞏。
秦界至大梁，初置三川郡。
二年，使蒙驁攻趙，定太原。
三年，蒙驁攻魏高都、汲，拔之。
攻趙榆次、新城、狼孟，取三十七城。
四月日食。
（四年）王龁攻上黨。
初置太原郡。
魏將無忌率五國兵擊秦，秦卻於河外。
蒙驁敗，解而去。
五月丙午，莊襄王卒，子政立，是為秦始皇帝。

translations.literal: King Zhuangxiang first year, great pardon of criminals, honored former kings' meritorious ministers, spread virtue generously to relatives and extended favor to the people. Eastern Zhou lord conspired with lords against Qin, Qin sent Chancellor Lü Buwei to execute him, completely took his state. Qin did not cut off their sacrifices, granted Yangren lands to Zhou lord, to maintain their sacrifices. Sent Meng Ao to attack Han, Han offered Chenggao, Gong. Qin border reached Daxiang, first established Sanchuan commandery. Second year, sent Meng Ao to attack Zhao, pacified Taiyuan. Third year, Meng Ao attacked Wei's Gaodu, Ji, captured them. Attacked Zhao's Yuci, Xincheng, Langmeng, took thirty-seven cities. Fourth month solar eclipse. (Fourth year) Wang He attacked Shangdang. First established Taiyuan commandery. Wei general Wu Ji led five states' troops to attack Qin, Qin retreated beyond the Yellow River. Meng Ao defeated, withdrew and left. Fifth month Bingwu day, King Zhuangxiang died, son Zheng ascended, this was Qin First Emperor.

sentences.zh: 秦王政立二十六年，初并天下為三十六郡，號為始皇帝。
始皇帝五十一年而崩，子胡亥立，是為二世皇帝。
三年，諸侯并起叛秦，趙高殺二世，立子嬰。
子嬰立月餘，諸侯誅之，遂滅秦。
其語在始皇本紀中。

translations.literal: Qin King Zheng ascended twenty-six years, first united the world into thirty-six commanderies, titled First Emperor. First Emperor fifty-first year died, son Huhai ascended, this was Second Generation Emperor. Third year, lords all rose up to rebel against Qin, Zhao Gao killed Second Generation, established Ziying. Ziying ascended over a month, lords executed him, thus extinguished Qin. The account is in the First Emperor's annals.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：秦之先為嬴姓。
其後分封，以國為姓，有徐氏、郯氏、莒氏、終黎氏、運奄氏、菟裘氏、將梁氏、黃氏、江氏、修魚氏、白冥氏、蜚廉氏、秦氏。
然秦以其先造父封趙城，為趙氏。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Qin's ancestors were of Ying surname. Later divided and enfeoffed, took state names as surnames, had Xu clan, Tan clan, Ju clan, Zhongli clan, Yunyan clan, Tuqiu clan, Jiangliang clan, Huang clan, Jiang clan, Xiuyu clan, Baiming clan, Feilian clan, Qin clan. However, Qin because their ancestor Zaofu was enfeoffed at Zhao city, became the Zhao clan.
